thread.section_title: Hotel Residence Henri 4 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect.
thread.title_full: Perfect. - Review of Hotel Residence Henri 4, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nicole J
title: Perfect.
text:
My mother in law and I stayed here for a week while visiting Paris March 2017. The staff are professional and delightful. The hotel is clean, quiet, and everything we hoped for. It's a small hotel, only 13 rooms, but it was quaint and a good location for hopping on the metro and enjoying the sites of the city. We will stay here again!
Thanks to the staff for a pleasant stay!
-Nicole
